posts.title: Database Design Best Practices
posts.content: Good database design is crucial for application performance and maintainability. This post covers normalization, indexing strategies, relationship modeling, and common pitfalls to avoid. Whether you're working with SQL or NoSQL databases, these principles will help you create better data structures.

posts.title: Git Branching Strategies
posts.content: Mastering Git branching is essential for efficient collaboration and code management. This post explores feature branching, release management, and trunk-based development strategies, along with best practices for merging and resolving conflicts.

posts.title: Testing in Web Development
posts.content: Testing is a critical part of modern web development. This post covers unit testing, integration testing, end-to-end testing, and test-driven development (TDD) strategies, helping you build reliable and maintainable web applications.
